hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: GEN_METHOD
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Méthode de génération des txts utilsiés pour la génération UGC. Soit les groovy Geoconcept, soit les Perl Atos de entrepôt scripts. Par défaut, si le param. est non renseigné, on utilise 'atos'

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Utilisation des sources. Par défaut, si le param. est non renseigné, on utilise 'default'

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SCHEMAS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Schéma BDD à utiliser, séparés par des pipe |

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
###################################################################################################### # This script is NOT MEANT TO BE EDITED in Jenkins, it is versionned at # https://geoportail.forge.ign.fr/hg/services-generation-geocodeur/direct_reverse/jenkins # # Launches the 'Nymes' autocompletion geocode generation on production validation # # This script is meant to be executed from a jenkins job such as # http://gpp3-entrepot-admin-geoportail-fr.aw.atosorigin.com/orchestrateur/view/GenerationGeocodeur/job/Generation_autocomp_PositionOfInterest_validation # #######################################################################################################
HG_NAME="services-generation-geocodeur"
DIRECT_ROOT="${WORKSPACE}/${HG_NAME}/direct_reverse" GROOVY_ROOT="${WORKSPACE}/${HG_NAME}/autocompletion"
FILER_AUTOCOMP="/FILERS/i30a_sat3/geocoder/ugc/reftables/autocomp/tables-autocomp"
echo "----------- Cloning the repo" rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/${HG_NAME}
# test param. BRANCH if [ -n "${BRANCH}" ] then hg clone -r ${BRANCH} https://geoportail.forge.ign.fr/hg/${HG_NAME} ${WORKSPACE}/${HG_NAME} else hg clone -r default https://geoportail.forge.ign.fr/hg/${HG_NAME} ${WORKSPACE}/${HG_NAME} fi
# test param. METHOD if [ ! -n "${GEN_METHOD}" ] then GEN_METHOD="atos" fi
# Generation if [ "$GEN_METHOD" == "atos" ] then
echo "----------- Launching script PERL" cd ${DIRECT_ROOT}/ # FIXME : how to do ? # RESULT=$( bash gen_autocomp_nyme.sh "${SCHEMAS}" # )
else
echo "----------- Launching script GROOVY" cd ${GROOVY_ROOT}/bash # RESULT=$( bash gen_autocomp_nyme.sh "${GROOVY_ROOT}" # )
fi
# if [ ${RESULT} != 0 ] # then # echo "Execution FAILED !" # exit -1 # fi
echo "----------- Archiving (latest)" rm -rf ${FILER_AUTOCOMP}/archives/bdnyme-autocomp-latest mkdir -p ${FILER_AUTOCOMP}/archives/bdnyme-autocomp-latest cp -pr ${FILER_AUTOCOMP}/bdnyme-autocomp-validation ${FILER_AUTOCOMP}/archives/bdnyme-autocomp-latest
echo "----------- Delivery Files" rm -rf ${FILER_AUTOCOMP}/bdnyme-autocomp-validation if [ "$GEN_METHOD" == "atos" ] then cp -pr ${DIRECT_ROOT}/gen/autocomp-nyme/PositionOfInterest ${FILER_AUTOCOMP}/bdnyme-autocomp-validation else cp -pr ${GROOVY_ROOT}/autocompNyme ${FILER_AUTOCOMP}/bdnyme-autocomp-validation fi
echo "----------- Delivery Service (in production validation)" for MACHINE in "tpgppv01s" "tpgppv02s" do ssh $MACHINE "sudo stop_service autocompletion.ign.fr 2>&1" ssh $MACHINE "cd /MIDDLE/gpp3/autocompletion.ign.fr/ugc/reftables/autocomp;unlink PositionOfInterest;ln -s ./tables-autocomp/bdnyme-autocomp-validation PositionOfInterest" ssh $MACHINE "sudo start_service autocompletion.ign.fr 2>&1" sleep 10
echo "----------- Testing Service Local" HTPP_CODE=$(curl -sL -w "%{http_code}" "http://${MACHINE}:8046/ols/apis/completion?type=PositionOfInterest&text=courceb%C5%93ufs" -o /dev/null) if [ ${HTPP_CODE} != 200 ] then echo "Testing Service Local on ${MACHINE} FAILED !" exit -1 fi done
echo "----------- Testing Service Global" HTPP_CODE=$(curl -v -XGET --proxy http://relay-gpp3-i-interco.sca.gpp.priv.atos.fr:3128 "http://gpp3-wxs-v-ign-fr.aw.atosorigin.com/ols/apis/completion?type=PositionOfInterest&text=courceb%C5%93ufs") if [ ${HTPP_CODE} != 200 ] then echo "Testing Service Global FAILED !" exit -1 fi
echo "----------- Cleaning" rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/*
